lead_paragraph: CHABON--Brenda, PhD, January 7, 2016. Clinical psychologist for 20 years at Montefiore Medical Center; esteemed teacher, beloved partner of Marco Persichetti and his daughter Katherine; loving sister of Arthur Chabon; cherished aunt of Isaac and Jacob Chabon. 1/3
